releases.name: v0.6.0
releases.body:
## Changes

**GENERAL**
Create Search feature;
Better behaviour for the commit form;
Many bug fixes.

**MERGE**
Fill merge message with commit history and sumary following the pattern "Merge remote tracking branch into branch"

releases.name: HOTFIX-CONFIGS
releases.body:
Some windows fixes:
- Change configurations bug fixed
- Added app version label
- Treated no global git configs message

releases.name: Code prettify and many improvements
releases.body:
- Visual improvements
- Let the user select the application language
- Search a way to list the available fonts in the user OS
- List the available shortcuts
- Add ESC shortcut (close the floating panels)

Diff
- Reorganize the numeral column and the diff colunm
- Search more about  `code-prettify` (https://github.com/google/code-prettify)

releases.name: Created packing tasks
releases.body:
- Fixed windows execSync bug
- Created `pack`, `pack:linux32`, `pack:linux64`, `pack:osx64`, `pack:win64`, `pack:win32` to create **.exe**, **.deb** **.rpm** and **.dmg** packages
- Added opening repository message

releases.name: Added merge feature
releases.body:
- Many fixes in the application
- Created merge feature
- Better Gettings Started UX
- Added basic support to mergetools

releases.name: First stable version of GitPie
releases.body: First version with a good number of functional features and reasonable stability

releases.name: v0.0.3
releases.body:
- Fixed some bugs
- Colorized diff per file avaliable
- List of tags
- Improved messages and context menu action
- Added clone capability

releases.name: v0.0.2
releases.body:
Context menu funcionalities added
Bugs fixed

releases.name: First Version
releases.body: - First implementation of GitPie (this isn't a alpha yet)
